thread.title: TravelCenters Of America Acquires 33 Convenience Stores In Northern Illinois
thread.title_full: TravelCenters Of America Acquires 33 Convenience Stores In Northern Illinois

title: TravelCenters Of America Acquires 33 Convenience Stores In Northern Illinois
text: TravelCenters Of America Acquires 33 Convenience Stores In Northern Illinois By Business Wire | 08/14/15 - 10:24 AM EDT Reprint TravelCenters of America LLC (TravelCenters), announced it has completed one of its previously disclosed acquisitions of 33 convenience store locations in northern Illinois. These locations offer branded gasoline, and a wide selection of groceries, fresh to-go food prepared on site and quick serve restaurants, and most include car washes. TravelCenters expects the convenience stores at these locations, which average approximately 3,400 square feet in size, will be rebranded as Minit Mart convenience stores and the sites will undergo improvements in the coming months. About TravelCenters of America LLC TravelCenters of America LLC (TravelCenters) is headquartered in Westlake, Ohio and is located in 43 states and Canada operating under the Minit Mart®, TA® and Petro Stopping Centers® brands. Its business includes 370 convenience stores, including 256 which are located at travel centers. For more information on TravelCenters, TA, and Petro Stopping Centers, please visit www.ta-petro.com . For more information on Minit Mart, please visit www.minitmart.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150814005414/en/ Copyright Business Wire 2010
